title: Spicy Chorizo and Black Bean Tacos
ingredients: 1 (15-ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
Toppings of your choice (e.g., shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, salsa, sour cream, guacamole)
instructions: Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the chorizo and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, until browned and cooked through, about 8-10 minutes. Remove the chorizo from the skillet and set aside.
Add the onion to the skillet and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic, chili powder, cumin, and smoked paprika and cook for another minute until fragrant.
Add the black beans to the skillet and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until heated through. Stir in the cooked chorizo.
Warm the tortillas according to package directions.
Fill the tortillas with the chorizo and black bean mixture and your desired toppings.
description: These flavorful tacos are quick and easy to make, perfect for a weeknight dinner. The spicy chorizo and hearty black beans are a delicious combination, and you can customize them with your favorite toppings.
